edge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
edge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
edge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: X, to: Z} :-
  edge{from: X, to: Z} |
  edge{from: X, to: Y} & trans_edge{from: Y, to: Z}.
----

edge_filter{a: X, b: Y} :-
  edge{from: X, to: Y}.
----

trans_edge{from: A, to: B}.
----
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "B"}.
trans_edge{from: "B", to: "C"}.
trans_edge{from: "C", to: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "C"}.
trans_edge{from: "A", to: "D"}.
trans_edge{from: "B", to: "D"}.
